page.title: 08HOLY TRINITY CHURCH
page.content: The church is 680 years old and it can hold 600 people.It's a very popular church,it sits on the banks of the Avon and on Sundays there are 3 or 4 services and about 150 people come to the services. The church also has a church choir which consists of about 40 people.The vicars name is Dennis Spiller and he's the one who takes the services.The church has mass connection's with Shakespeare.He was baptized there and worshiped there on numerous occasions.He was also buried on April 25th 1616 in the church chancel,a privilege which cost him Â£440.The church deviates 4 feet off centre to the North at the Eastend and an interesting ornament is the sanctuary knocker on North door. Fugatives would get 37 days sanctuary if they could knock it vigorously.
